page.title: 06ITCHEN VALLEY PC (1)
page.content: This Parish Council meets every month at Itchen Abbas Village Hall,to the north west of our area. The last meeting reported in the {"Hampshire {Chronicle"}on July 12th 1985 dealt with the following matters: (a) fees for the use of the Couch Green Football Field. These were fixed at Â£7.50 for each match played. The field is currently used by the Worhties Football Club. (b) Application was being made for a changing room to be built;the cost being Â£12,000. (c) Avington had come second in the Best Kept Village Competition for Hampshire. (d) It was noted that a new Youth Club had been formed called 'The Itchen River Rats'.They had received a grant from Association of Parish Councils (Winchester Branch)
